message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $120. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the item, but I'm looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider offering the product at $95?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $95. I'm willing to meet you halfway, though. How about $110?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, would $100 be within your range?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. How about $115?
I see you're trying to accommodate my budget, Alice. Thank you. I'm willing to go up to $105 for this product. Could we possibly meet at that price?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $105, Bob, but I'm willing to get close. How about $112?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm glad we're getting closer. I'm willing to pay $108 for the product. Can we agree on that price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession. How about $115?
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm willing to pay $110 for the product. I hope this meets your requirements.
